Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2015 02:00PM MamaAnnaliese wrote: I'm right there with you. Even when you know deep down that something is definitely not right, it feels taboo to bring it up. Why is that? The waiting and not knowing is scary and incredibly stressful! Is there no way he can push up the biopsy and surgery? Be persistent! Let the BS know how you're feeling. And yes, take care of yourself as best you can. I've been taking baths, reading, resting as much as possible. Lavender essential oil  helps me a little with the tension too. Best of luck to you!
Posts.Title: Becoming Impatient: ( linda15 linda15
